translations: 读经文；犹太人向以色列的移居

sentences.sentence: Pray for the 144,951 Jews in the Mevasseret Gate to make Aliyah.
sentences.translation: 祈求在美瓦萨利门内的144,951名犹太人能归回以色列。

sentences.sentence: It aims less to promote aliyah than to give an instant hit of Jewishness.
sentences.translation: 相对推动“阿利亚”回归运动，该计划目的更多地是给以“犹太性”的直接碰撞。

sentences.sentence: Aliyah literally means “ascent”, while leaving Israel is yeridah, “descent”.
sentences.translation: “阿利亚”的字面意思是“上升”，而离开以色列则是“耶利达（yeridah）”，意为“下降”。
